name: Primeros Pasos
description: Primeros Pasos Spanish Immersion Childcare, Preschool, and PreK provides a nurturing learning environment for children aged 3 months to 5 years. As a full immersion program, strives to communicate with the children in Spanish at all times. The dedicated staff of native Spanish speakers bring passion and expertise to a dynamic learning environment, focused on full Spanish immersion. With a low child-to-teacher ratio, up-to-date certifications in pediatric CPR, Health and Safety, and First Aid, th
